content.html: My mom saw this photo and said “your legs look huge” (derogatory) Parents, please never speak to your children this way about their bodies. It doesn’t matter if they’re 5 or 35. My “huge” legs are strong and beautiful. I wish my mom could see that too.
content.value:
My mom saw this photo and said “your legs look huge” (derogatory)

Parents, please never speak to your children this way about their bodies. It doesn’t matter if they’re 5 or 35. 

My “huge” legs are strong and beautiful. I wish my mom could see that too.
